thread.title: Kim Kardashian says farewell to Barack Obama with family photos of North meeting the former President
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian says farewell to Barack Obama with family photos of North meeting the former President

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Kim Kardashian says farewell to Barack Obama with family photos of North meeting the former President
text:
Kim Kardashian says farewell to Barack Obama with family photos of North meeting the former President "Thank you Mr President. You will be missed," she wrote Share Kim bids farewell to Barack Obama (Photo: Instagram/Kim Kardashian) Share Get celebs   
Kim Kardashian has joined a long list of celebrities who have bid farewell to Barack Obama as Donald Trump became the 45th President of the United States on Friday. 
Kim uploaded a series of photos to her website of the Kardashian-Wests meeting the former POTUS. 
"Thank you Mr President. You will be missed," she wrote alongside a picture of her and Obama chatting happily. 
A second shows Obama stroking North's head which was captioned, "What an era... I can't wait to show these to my kids one day." 
However, in the third picture little North doesn't look so happy to be there. 
Kim explained it's because her daughter fell over and Obama gave her M&Ms but the reality star wouldn't let her eat them. Read More Barron Trump is the ultimate preteen as he refuses to hold mum Melania's hand after presidential inauguration 
"Northie! She fell and was crying. Potus gave her White House M&Ms & I wanted 2 save them 4memories so wouldn't let her eat them and she cried again," she wrote next to it. 
Mr Trump, who lost the popular vote by 2.3million more votes than any winning president in history, took the oath of office at noon on Friday in Washington DC. 
In a highly nationalistic inaugural speech Mr Trump told the American people: “From this day forward it’s going to be only America First.”
